item.title: Java app monitoring with ELK - Part I - Logstash and Logback
item.author: thespamtrapp@gmail.com (Serban Balamaci)
item.description: Logs for developers are undeniably the most important source of information available to track down problems and understand what is happening with your applications. It makes sense to have a good tool in our toolbox that will enable us to get better insight of this data.
